main event: A large, milky-white object with things on the side was sighted for 6 seconds in Ypsilanti, Michigan.
interesting points: The object had an appearance of marble or milky plaster.
Things on the side of the object went to red flashing stars.
The object moved in a direct path into the clouds.
The witness was unsure how to evaluate the limited information provided.
The report was submitted in accordance with Air Force Regulation 200-2.
sighted object: a large, milky-white object with things on the side
